=== Summary ===
    This is a project based in a mail miner. That application uses the IMAP <nowiki>[[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2060.txt|RFC2060]]</nowiki> protocol to search and list all attacheds from one mail. Then just click to download the checked files.
